Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: much more accessible meaning i could ask a lot more questions

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teachers usually give more specific feedback and go more in depth. GenAI usually generates the same feedback despite asking it to go more indepth
